thread.section_title: Eyes of India Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eyes of India | www.eyesofindia.com | 2 of 35
thread.title: Carrie
thread.title_full: Eyes of India reviewed by Carrie

author: Carrie
title: Carrie
text: I purchased one of their blue ombre tapestries on Christmas. First impressive thing was that they had it shipped by the very next day, and I received an email to confirm! I don't even think it took longer than a week and a half to arrive at my house.. Upon opening the package, there was a hand written note thanking me for my purchase but they made it personal. That was so nice to read! I've had it hung up on my wall for several weeks now and just the other day got an email from Eyes of India making sure my package shipped and that I was happy with my purchase. Wow!! Uhh, yes!! I was very pleased with the product and almost more so by their attention to the customer. They really do care and want you to be happy with their products! And I am VERY pleased with mine, and you will be too!
